About us

Olivier Binet

Head of business in France

20 years of experience in E-Commerce and FinTech, focusing on business development and innovation. Conducts independent coaching for startups development. Lives in Paris, France.

We are a team of successful, modern, serial entrepreneurs with vast experience in creating IT solutions. We entered banking to become technological challengers.

Alena Valovaya

Project Manager

Bringing over two decades of expertise in E-Commerce and FinTech, specializing in business development and driving innovation. Currently based in Berlin, Germany.

Our company is driven by a passion for innovation in the financial landscape. Our collective experience in IT solutions empowers us to lead a transformation in the banking sector, bringing state-of-the-art technology to the forefront.

Thomas Finan

Head of Operations

A seasoned professional with 15 years of experience in E-Commerce and FinTech, with a primary focus on spearheading business development and fostering innovation.

At the heart of our company lies a group of seasoned entrepreneurs, each with a proven track record in the IT industry.

Ivo Dimitrov

Chief Technology Officer

With a rich history of 17 years in E-Commerce and FinTech, demonstrating a strong emphasis on business development and driving innovation. Currently residing in Barcelona, Spain.

Comprising a team of accomplished entrepreneurs with a forward-thinking mindset, our company is poised to disrupt the banking sector. Armed with extensive expertise in IT solutions.
